name: DEAD LINES
description:
Cat in a Chip, by Tomaz Mota

this game was made for the mini-jam 123 game jam

the theme of the game jam was "web"

and the limitation of the game jam was "there is no ground"

this game was developed in 72 hours (3 days in total)

game controls are explained in game and here:

- Controls -

A and D to move

SPACEBAR to jump

CLICK and HOLD LEFT MOUSE BUTTON, MOVE MOUSE, then RELEASE to weave webs (requires ability unlock)

CLICK and HOLD RIGHT MOUSE BUTTON to web swing (requires ability unlock)

S to drop down from web

E to reset webs
